programme.title: Lockup: Colorado: Extended Stay
programme.desc: One reality of prison is that there's never a shortage of pain, and at the Limon Correctional Facility in Colorado, there's enough left over for the visitors as well; drama unfolds as a father and son try to reconcile a violent past.

programme.title: Lockup: Colorado: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Even for inmates serving hard time, love can be a strong motivator; in prison, reaching out to others can be a dicey proposition; some inmates just don't know when someone's getting too close until it's too late.

programme.title: Lockup: Tampa: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A surprise attack on a sheriff's deputy takes an unexpected turn, a convicted rapist loses his cool in court and an accused murderer in a high profile case tries to cash in on her notoriety.

programme.title: Lockup: Tampa: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A convict finds that jail offers a chance for revenge, a former stripper fears losing her daughter and you'll get a "taste" of Tampa behind bars.

programme.title: Lockup: Tampa: Extended Stay
programme.desc: An inmate with suspicious tax forms becomes a problem for the jail, and a murder ends with the victim burned alive in a dumpster, pitting friends and family against each other.

programme.title: Lockup: Tampa: Extended Stay
programme.desc: An inmate with a long record runs an extortion scheme, while drugs inside the jail pose a lethal threat; the jail's newest team member makes her presence known.

programme.title: Lockup: Tampa: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A drug-addicted mother asks a judge to keep her out of prison; just brought in on drug charges, a young man attempts to make bail, while another awaits sentencing for an unthinkable crime.

programme.title: Lockup: Colorado: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Prison is an underground economy, where some deals are signed in ink and others are signed in blood; a rare look at the schemes, hustles and extortions conducted behind prison walls and the consequences they carry.

programme.title: Lockup: Colorado: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Extractions provide some of the most dramatic interactions that ever occur between inmates and staff, and few extractions in the state of Colorado have provided more drama than the ones involving Roy Slagle.

programme.title: Lockup: Colorado: Extended Stay
programme.desc: One reality of prison is that there's never a shortage of pain, and at the Limon Correctional Facility in Colorado, there's enough left over for the visitors as well; drama unfolds as a father and son try to reconcile a violent past.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.sub-title: The Bling Ring; The Fraudster, the Ex-Stripper and the Missing Millions
programme.desc: A group of wannabe-celebs make off with millions from Hollywood's rich and famous.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: Middle-aged real estate investor finds young love and steals client money to impress his new bride.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.sub-title: The Cunning Cowgirl Crook; Dollars for Dumps
programme.desc: A small town comptroller steals $53 million from her city to fund a horse-breeding empire; a crooked real estate developer lures victims to his phony residential oases.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: A successful financial advisor's world crumbles under a multi-million dollar scam; a Chicago-area rapper convinces a local businessman that he's got a new gig that doesn't exist.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.sub-title: The Most Hated Man in America?
programme.desc: Businessman Martin Shkreli raises the price of a life-saving drug 5,000 percent, but it's his shady accounting and Internet trolling that lands the "Pharma Bro" in hot water.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: Mike The Situation Sorrentino flaunts washboard abs and a party boy image, but when it comes to paying his taxes, he'd rather play than pay.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: An artsy German heiress Anna Delvey makes a splash in Downtown New York's social scene, but she's really a Russian-born con artist who's trying to swindle $23 million from banks while dodging unpaid bills.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: A trio of Texas conmen score $100 million by telling investors there's big money in the life settlement insurance business.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: A charismatic New Mexico real estate broker scams $75 million in a fake land investment program.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: Self-proclaimed teen millionaire Ephren Taylor preaches his "safe" investments at church seminars and on the internet, fleecing victims out of millions and pumping cash into flashy living and his wife's hip-hop career.
